name: Button Bash
description:
Are you ready to try a unique and addictive game? Your goal is simply to prevent the board from filling up by hitting the buttons as they light up. Be fast and don't hit the red ones. How long can you last?

Button Bash features:
● Multiple modes to play, including the new stress inducing insane mode that only the gifted should try
● Easily broadcast your scores to the world through the leader boards to show your skill
● Compete with friends and other users to establish your dominance
● Challenging and fun for all ages
